message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $100 for it. I hope this aligns well with your expectations and budget.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm trying to stay within a certain budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $80?
